alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Southern Oneida; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 3:39PM EST until February 18 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 11 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected along with flash freeze potential. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Northern Oneida, Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Onondaga, Steuben, Madison and Southern Oneida counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 11 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong cold front moves through late tonight with temperatures quickly falling into the 20s. Any wet and untreated roadways and bridges could quickly freeze.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Southern Oneida; Steuben; Yates
